AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Necrontyr Soldier
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Prior to their bio-transferrence [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a soldier, they have retained some of their skills in combat despite the damage the transfer did to their soul.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Necrontyr Leader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Prior to their bio-transferrence [PAWN_nameDef] used to be a leader of the Necrontyr, they have retained some of their skills despite the damage the transfer did to their soul.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Necron Warrior
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the bio-transferrence [PAWN_nameDef] became little more than a soulless husk, incapable of anything more than war.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Necron Deathmark
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the bio-transferrence [PAWN_nameDef] became little more than a soulless husk, incapable of anything more than war.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Necron Lord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the bio-transferrence [PAWN_nameDef] retained their personality, despite the removal of their soul they still act similarly to how they were when they were alive.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Necron Overlord
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: After the bio-transferrence [PAWN_nameDef] retained their personality, despite the removal of their soul they still act similarly to how they were when they were alive. Overlords tend to remain in a command position, at the top of their dynasty.
